topic.title: Setting System Administration Preferences
topic.p: The Setting System Administration Preferences window enables you to set the number of packages per page that you want to view when you are looking at your software packages.

ol.title: To Set Your Packages Per Page:
ol.li: On the control panel, click System Administration in the My Preferences menu. The System Administration Preferences window appears.
Click the Packages Per Page drop-down menu and select the number of packages you want to view.
Click Save. The number has been set.
